New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 4 月 22 日星期一 10:09:02 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Pedestrian located with serious injuries after suspected hit-and-run in Wellington https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pedestrian- located-with-serious-injuries-after-suspected-hit-and-run-in-wellington/S4LKY67ZTNHAJMFF4GEP5VFZZQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pedestrian- located-with-serious-injuries-after-suspected-hit-and-run-in-wellington/S4LKY67ZTNHAJMFF4GEP5VFZZQ/ The person was located by a ride-share driver on Sunday morning. Mon, 22 Apr 2024 09:51:23 +0000 A pedestrian was located by a ride-share driver in Wellington on Sunday morning following a suspected hit-and-run.
Doctors’ strike: 2500 Health New Zealand Te Whatu Ora employees to strike after pay offer rejected https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/doctors-strike-2500-te-whatu-ora-health-new-zealand-employees-to-strike-after-pay-offer-rejected/SDD3YIPAPBC4HPQQFNYRDKS6ZY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/doctors-strike-2500-te-whatu-ora-health-new-zealand-employees-to-strike-after-pay-offer-rejected/SDD3YIPAPBC4HPQQFNYRDKS6ZY/ Raphael FranksUnion members rejected the offers and voted to strike for 25 hours from May 7. Mon, 22 Apr 2024 08:00:23 +0000 Members of the Resident Doctors Association issued a strike notice covering 2500 of Health New Zealand’s doctors after bargaining with the health agency reached “an impasse”.
Man punched woman unconscious outside Blenheim tavern over ‘hurtful’ comment about unborn child https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-punched-woman-unknown-outside-blenheim-tavern-over-hurtful-comment-about-unborn-child/G452RCS5WVCLZGT7FHDLE5YTUI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-punched-woman-unknown-outside-blenheim-tavern-over-hurtful-comment-about-unborn-child/G452RCS5WVCLZGT7FHDLE5YTUI/ Tracy NealThe victim was left with facial injuries and a cut to the back of her head. Mon, 22 Apr 2024 08:00:00 +0000 A woman was knocked unconscious by a man upset she had made a "hurtful comment" about his unborn child. Photo / 123rf
West Auckland fatal ram attack: Ram was not owned by couple, Alfred Helge Hansen and Gaye Carole Hansen, killed in Waitākere https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/west-auckland-fatal-ram-attack-ram-was-not-owned-by- Couple-alfred-helge-hansen-and-gaye-carole-hansen-在怀塔克雷被杀/BGTTWJNXQBBJVN6FXQOEVSAS7Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/west-auckland-fatal-ram-attack-ram-was-not-owned-by- Couple-alfred-helge-hansen-and-gaye-carole-hansen-在怀塔克雷被杀/BGTTWJNXQBBJVN6FXQOEVSAS7Y/ Jaime Lyth'We keep thinking, why didn’t we hear anything?' another neighbour said. Mon, 22 Apr 2024 07:50:09 +0000 Flowers on the fence of Helge Hansen and Gaye Hansen (inset) property on Anzac Valley Road in Waitakere. The couple are believed to have died after being attacked by a ram in one of their paddocks in April 2024 New Zealand Herald photograph by Cameron Pitney 22 April 2024
Health explainer: Pharmac’s funding of glucose monitors a major step - with a few catches https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/health-explainer-pharmacs-funding-of-glucose-monitors-a-major-step-with-a-few-catches/MCRHTAY3YVHPXHEYT2P7J43C5A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/health-explainer-pharmacs-funding-of-glucose-monitors-a-major-step-with-a-few-catches/MCRHTAY3YVHPXHEYT2P7J43C5A/ Isaac DavisonUp to 18,000 people with diabetes will soon get free access to life-saving technology. Mon, 22 Apr 2024 07:18:16 +0000 Karen Reed, who has type one diabetes, used to do up to 10 blood tests a day to manage her blood sugar levels. Pharmac's proposal to fund glucose monitors would let her "get on with her life", she said.
Driver admits causing crash that killed motorcyclist Anthony Keen on Tasman Highway https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/driver-admits-causing-crash-that-killed-motorcyclist-anthony-keen-on-tasman-highway/E2AJIPPKAJCONLSVMXBENTWLNI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/driver-admits-causing-crash-that-killed-motorcyclist-anthony-keen-on-tasman-highway/E2AJIPPKAJCONLSVMXBENTWLNI/ Tracy NealAnthony Keen died at the scene after hitting Chapman's car as she turned in front of him. Mon, 22 Apr 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Anthony Keen was killed while out riding his motorbike on the Tasman Highway, west of Nelson, in January this year.
Te Awamutu’s Rosetown Print to turn a new page https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/te-awamutus-rosetown-print-to-turn-a-new-page/6DM5EXUN6RGADJE5AD4LOO3NM4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/te-awamutus-rosetown-print-to-turn-a-new-page/6DM5EXUN6RGADJE5AD4LOO3NM4/ Jesse WoodThe Morrises want to reassure the community that the business has sold, not closed. Vandals plague Southland town Lumsden’s public toilets https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/vandals-plague-southland-town-lumsdens-public-toilets/V5FTF5I4FRC6TGLR4BAGU3CAF4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/vandals-plague-southland-town-lumsdens-public-toilets/V5FTF5I4FRC6TGLR4BAGU3CAF4/ Matthew RosenbergToilet block has been hit by vandals many times, forcing council to explore new solutions. Mon, 22 Apr 2024 06:10:32 +0000 Lumsden is a small Southland town about an hour north of Invercargill. Its public toilets have been damaged to the tune of about $11,000. Photo / Southland District Council
Mongrel Mob gang attack: Jail terms for murder, manslaughter in Hastings’ Darcy Strickland case https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/jail-sentences-handed-down-for-murder-and-manslaughter-in-hastings-darcy-strickland-case/SMCAFH2DSVF3JL3EORPQAHVRYM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/jail-sentences-handed-down-for-murder-and-manslaughter-in-hastings-darcy-strickland-case/SMCAFH2DSVF3JL3EORPQAHVRYM/ Ric StevensPolice thank people who provided information as gang associates are sent to jail. Anzac Day: Hawke’s Bay remembers with more than 30 services https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/anzac-day-hawkes-bay-remembers-with-more-than-30-services/57VGLRVUI5CC7FKSVPREBXUA6Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/anzac-day-hawkes-bay-remembers-with-more-than-30-services/57VGLRVUI5CC7FKSVPREBXUA6Y/ Doug LaingThe day starts with dawn parades and continues with civic and church services.
